summary: A small quaint cottage with a awesome view.
descriptionHtml:
Nillheim Ridge Is a small, rustic and charming, no load house located in the best area of Skyrim. It has spectacular all around views. Built next to the Nillheim nordic tower, you can see clearly all the way to Windhelm. This is my first ever mod, hope you like it!

This mod requires: Dawnguard, Dragonborn and Hearthfire.


https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JFWX31k_ZHw#t=13

Thank you izon87604 (Youtube user Nozi87) so much for the amazing video!


Mod Includes:

Enchanting/ alchemy room
Bedroom with safe and lock box
kitchen with cooking spit and oven
armory with grindstone, workbench, and tanning rack
outdoor fire pit
deck with spectacular views
entry way
map marker
key and deed
author: Paul Millhouse
